title: Cotton Pest Classification and Management Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge of agricultural ecology and image analysis basics
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based image analysis tools, with a focus on field-applicable pest management strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can classify the ten major cotton pests in the field with 95% accuracy
Learners can explain the operating principles of a deep learning-based pest classification system using RGB images
Learners can develop economically and environmentally friendly pest management strategies based on classification results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
